entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
